sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import "../styles/tour-details.css" import { Container, Row, Col, Form, ListGroup} from 'reactstrap' import {useParams} from 'react-router-dom' import tourData from '../assets/data/tours' import calculateAvgRating from './../utils/avgRating' import avatar from "../assets/images/avatar.jpg" const TourDetails = () => { const {id} = useParams() //this is an static data const tour = tourData.find(tour=> tour.id === id) //destructure properties from tour object const {photo, title, desc, price, address, reviews, city, distance, maxGroupSize}= tour const {totalRating, avgRating}= calculateAvgRating (reviews) // format data const options ={day:'numeric', month:'long', year:'numeric'} return ( <>

{title}

{calculateAvgRating === 0 ? null : avgRating} {totalRating === 0 ? ( "Not related" ) : ( ({reviews?.length}) )} {address}
{city} ${price}/per person {maxGroupSize}
Description

{desc}

{/*======= tour reviews section ====== */}

Reviews ({reviews?.length} reviews)

1 2 3 4 5
{reviews?.map(review => (
Shanth
))}
{/*======= tour reviews section end ====== */}
) } export default TourDetails;
